you grow out your beard you don't Mar it

that's how we grow in him when we walk

does as I remember several years ago
when I was first confronted about the
Sabbath because I was raised and he go

eat whatever I finally figured out
several years ago oh man the Sabbath day
is from Friday sundown to Saturday
sundown that's the Shabbat that's the
day and at that point I had a job where
I had to work you know every fourth
saturday of the month and I knew that
basically if you don't do that they're
gonna fire you and it's a really good
job but I had to come to the decision
right I had to go to my boss and say you
know what I love this job it's a great
job lots of benefits but I can't

matter what it is whether it's the beard
whether it's keeping Shabbat whether

so we can grow in
rather than the other way around where
